--- title: "Does Airlines Safety Improve Over Time ✈️?" author: "Josephine Valensia" date: "2022-09-06" categories: [Article] image: "image.jpg" execute: echo: false warning: false message: false --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## About the data The data of this story is sourced from [TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2018/2018-08-07), which has been modified from the original data by [Aviation Safety Network](https://aviation-safety.net/). The data contains 336 observations and 6 variables. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Variable Class Description
X integer Number of observations
airline character Airline (asterisk indicates that regional subsidiaries are included)
avail_seat_km_per_week double Available seat kilometers flown every week
year_range character Range of year (1985-1999 & 2000-2014)
type_of_event character Types of events happened : incidents, fatal accidents, fatalities
n_events integer Total number of event that happened
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Top 10 airlines with the highest number of incidents in 1985-99 and 2000-14](index_files/figure-html/fig-inc-1.png){#fig-inc width=960} ::: ::: From the @fig-inc we can see ::: {#tbl-diff .cell tbl-cap='Average number of incidents, fatal accidents and fatalities had decreased, comparing both range of years.'} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Average number of incidents
Type of event 1985-1999 2000-2014 Difference(%)
incidents 7.179 4.125 -42.537
fatal accidents 2.179 0.661 -69.672
fatalities 112.411 55.518 -50.612
````` ::: ::: From the @tbl-diff below we can see that on average airlines has become more safe as the number of incidents, fatal accidents and fatalities had decreased. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Average number of fatalities in 10 million seats
1985-1999 2000-2014 Difference (%)
1.297 0.648 -50.058
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Number of fatalities in 10 million seats](index_files/figure-html/fatalities-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
